Robyn Noble

Software Engineer

A little bit about me...

After over ten years in the retail world I've made the exciting turn to software development. I have an extensive amount of communication and customer service background. I am well versed in time management, multi-tasking, and my favorite, collaboration (just to name a few).

Portfolio

Furniture Exchange was my first solo project, it's an app that allows users to browse listings, add their own and make edits/remove them.

Photo gallery of my son made using React.js. This app allows users to toggle between the picture and information about it. Users my also 'like' an image and see how many 'likes' it has.
